title: Mini-Ep 231: Loving The Middle Ages
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 231: Loving The Middle Ages
itunes:subtitle: Kate is in Covid quarantine and Doree takes a trip to a 12th-century convent. Then, they answer listener questions about Aveda products, how to wear foundation with freckles, and getting a signature scent for your home.Question of the week: What is ...
description:
Kate is in Covid quarantine and Doree takes a trip to a 12th-century convent. Then, they answer listener questions about Aveda products, how to wear foundation with freckles, and getting a signature scent for your home.


Question of the week: What is your #1 (2 and 3) pop culture consumption recc of them moment? What should everyone be into this fall? Email/text/call us and let us know. If you want to reach us, our voicemail number is (781) 591-0390, and our email is forever35podcast@gmail.com.

 

  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter 

 

This episode is sponsored by:

ULTA BEAUTY - Ulta Beauty. The possibilities are beautiful. So, shop skincare at ULTA Beauty now.
